title: The Big Suey: Meadowlarkers 48 "What Are You, Stupid?"
description:
The Meadowlarkers are back to their full roster with Howard Bryant, Kate Fagan, and Amin Elhassan diving into both the Robert Sarver and Ime Udoka stories in the NBA. The crew analyzes the journalistic ethics in the reporting on Udoka, the currency of reporting on Twitter, the new era of owners being pressured to sell franchises, men and women working together in sports, public vs. private citizens, power dynamics along race and gender lines, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
